鈍ちん: (にぶちん) - dullard (gen. from not picking up on other people's feelings)
鈍らす: (にぶらす) - to blunt; to dull; to weaken
鈍る: (なまる) - to become blunt/to grow dull; to become less capable/to weaken/to falter

鈍臭い: (のろくさい) - slow (opposite of fast); stupid; irritating
鈍色: (にびいろ) - dark gray; dark grey
鈍行: (どんこう) - ordinary train; slow train
鈍角三角形: (どんかくさんかくけい) - obtuse triangle
鈍重: (どんじゅう) - dullness; bovinity; thickheaded; slow-witted
鈍頭: (どんとう) - obtuse (of the shape of a leaf); rounded
鈎股弦: (こうこげん) - three sides of right triangle (minor cathetus, major cathetus & hypotenuse)
鈎股弦の定理: (こうこげんのていり) - Pythagorean theorem
鈑金: (ばんきん) - sheet metal; metal plate

鈴なり: (すずなり) - bunches (e.g. of fruit)/clusters; crammed (e.g. with people)/overflowing
鈴なりになる: (すずなりになる) - to grow in clusters
鈴を鳴らす: (りんをならす) - to ring a bell
鈴口: (すずぐち) - entrance to a daimyo's mansion; glans (of the penis)
鈴懸の木: (スズカケノキ) - plane tree (esp. the Oriental plane, Platanus orientalis)
鈴生り: (すずなり) - bunches (e.g. of fruit)/clusters; crammed (e.g. with people)/overflowing
鈴生りに生る: (すずなりになる) - to grow in clusters

鉄: (tetsu) - ferro, ferro (Fe); forte e duro (como ferro); entusiasta de ferrovias
鉄ちゃん: (てっちゃん) - trainspotter; railway enthusiast; railfan
鉄ちり: (てっちり) - boiled fugu dish (served with ponzu dipping sauce)
鉄つい: (てっつい) - iron hammer; crushing blow
鉄ついを下す: (てっついをくだす) - to crack down on (e.g. crime, corruption); to deal a crushing blow to; to bring down the hammer on
鉄は熱いうちに打て: (てつはあついうちにうて) - strike while the iron is hot

鉄分: (てつぶん) - (as a nutrient or in water) iron (content)
鉄則: (てっそく) - ironclad regulation; inviolable rule
鉄勒: (てつろく) - Tiele people; a Central Asian Turkic people
鉄十字勲章: (てつじゅうじくんしょう) - Iron Cross
鉄味: (かなあじ) - metallic; cutting edge of a bladed instrument

鉄塔: (tettou) - torre de aço; torre de eletricidade, torre de transmissão
